head.title: Metro Business; Smithsonian Names Magazine Publisher

hedline.hl1: Metro Business; Smithsonian Names Magazine Publisher

abstract.p: Smithsonian Institution names Amy P Wilkins as publisher of its magazine group (S)

block.p: The Smithsonian Institution has appointed a new publisher of its magazine group and says that she will be based in New York.

The new publisher, Amy P. Wilkins, will oversee Smithsonian and Air & Space, as well as the Institution's marketing and sales divisions, officials said. Ms. Wilkins, the third publisher in the 24-year history of Smithsonian, has been the publisher of Biography magazine for the last two years.
The Smithsonian Institution has appointed a new publisher of its magazine group and says that she will be based in New York.

The new publisher, Amy P. Wilkins, will oversee Smithsonian and Air & Space, as well as the Institution's marketing and sales divisions, officials said. Ms. Wilkins, the third publisher in the 24-year history of Smithsonian, has been the publisher of Biography magazine for the last two years.

In a memorandum to the institution's staff, Gary Beer, chief executive of Smithsonian Business Ventures, said Ms. Wilkins would be the first Smithsonian publisher to be based in New York, rather than in Washington, D.C., where the Institution's offices are.
